d.Name: SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central Integration with Microsoft Active Directory
d.Description:
This package integrates SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central with Third-Party vendor, Microsoft Active Directory.

Through this integration, you can create / disable a user in Active Directory when an employee is hired or terminated in SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central.

This integration also helps in sending a notification through email, to the HR (in the same location as that of an employee) about the status of the creation or deactivation of an employee.
d.ShortText: Creating / Disabling a user in Microsoft Active Directory is triggered only when an employee is hired or terminated in SAP SuccessFactors Employee Central.
